original_text: so that the tested genuineness of your faith—more precious than gold that perishes though it is tested by fire—may be found to result in praise and glory and honor at the revelation of Jesus Christ.
korean_text: 너희 믿음의 확실함은 불로 연단하여도 없어질 금보다 더 귀하여 예수 그리스도께서 나타나실 때에 칭찬과 영광과 존귀를 얻게 할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: so that the tested genuineness of your faith
more precious than gold that perishes
though it is tested by fire
may be found to result in praise and glory and honor
sentences.korean_translation: 칭찬과 영광과 존귀를 이루게 되려 함이라

sentences.original_text: at the revelation of Jesus Christ.
